snippet: Wendy’s, the hamburger chain, said that its premium food offerings, such as the Son of Baconator and the Asiago Ranch chicken sandwich, helped lift revenue by 2.7 percent at some restaurants.
abstract: Wendy's announces that premium food offerings have helped lift revenue by 2.7 percent at restaurants open at least 15 months, the sixth straight quarterly increase; reports net loss of $26.2 million, or 7 cents a share, down from a loss of $4 million, or a penny a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 4 percent to $636.3 million.
lead_paragraph: Wendy’s, the hamburger chain, said that its premium food offerings, such as the Son of Baconator and the Asiago Ranch chicken sandwich, helped lift revenue by 2.7 percent at some restaurants.

headline.main: Premium Food Items Help Results at Wendy’s
headline.print_headline: Premium Food Offers Lift Results atWendy’s
